features: Free shipping and Pay on delivery! The following options for receiving an order are possible: Pickup of goods from our store in Kyiv, courier delivery in Kyiv, delivery to other settlements of Ukraine by carrier companies or by mail. Payment for the goods is made upon receipt of the goods in hryvnia. Cashless payment is also possible.
promo: Buying a wristwatch for men in Ukraine is very simple. On our site you have the opportunity to read the reviews of the owners, which can help you decide on the choice of model and brand.
footer-about: Delivery is carried out to any settlement in Ukraine. Next-day delivery is possible to the following settlements: Dnepropetrovsk, Zaporozhye, Lviv, Mariupol, Odessa, Poltava, Ternopil, Kharkiv. It is now much easier to buy men's watches in any region of Ukraine!
newsletter-about: The Porten online watch store specializes in wholesale and retail sales of only original high quality watches with an official guarantee from authorized branded service centers.
